actions.in_committee: House Committee on Public Works + Transportation

official_title: To provide for a Department of Transportation study of the impact of the depressed state of the general aviation industry on our Nation's air transportation system.

summary.text: General Aviation Assessment Act of 1991 - Directs the Secretary of Transportation to study and report to the Congress on the impact of the depressed state of the general aviation industry on the U.S. air transportation system.

titles.title: To provide for a Department of Transportation study of the impact of the depressed state of the general aviation industry on our Nation's air transportation system.
